jobs.title: Mentor
description: Teaching students from grades K-12 subjects including: Java, Python, HTML/CSS/JS, Hatch, JQuery, PHP, & Firebase
Develop challenges, pathways, and lessons for kidOYO’s online learning platform for full-stack web development skills
Lead classes teaching web development skills including backend, frontend, and proper UI/UX development

jobs.title: Co-Founder & Chair
description: Created 1st Stony Brook Affiliated Hackathon with over 350 participants with only two other organizers
Spearheaded event logistics: registrations, volunteers, activities, prizes, budgets, schedules, public relations, and even site creation
Formulated and created a framework for future repetition of this event
Remodeled the campus vision and understanding of hackathon culture and the application of Computer Science to the real world

jobs.title: President
description: Created and conducted weekly general body meetings of over 100 students with engaging topics
Coordinated collaborations between 10+ organizations, 5+ campus departments, and sponsoring companies from all over
Managed and delegated tasks of eboard members to ensure every deadline and goal is reached through the organization and planning of internal Eboard Meetings
Represented the club to all external sponsorship partners while maintaining and expanding lines of organization's professional network
Directed an initiative to rebrand the view of computer science to all students, including other majors on campus
Reconstructed organization’s eboard structure for the ability to grow and maintain itself
Revised the procedures, policies, and constitution of the organization to optimize workflow and time commitment

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Created web teaching tools for integrating new technology to the college classrooms
Managed multiple classroom software projects including but not limited to: bookMaker, IVQ, WATT
Organized community outreach events to increase department representation on campus
Languages programmed in: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, Node, C#, Aframe, Python, Unity, and Bash

activities: Stony Brook Computing Society (President 2019-20, Vice President 2018-19 , Secretary 2017 - 18)
DoIT Student Advisory Board (Student Board Member 2017-2018)
